name: Puzzle: Nature 2
description:
Puzzle: Nature 2 - Meet the continuation of the first part of the game! The game is a cute and colorful puzzle game. Your goal is to put the pieces of the puzzle together to make a complete, beautiful picture. You will find a wide variety of pictures from light to heavy, so try to collect them all!

Peculiarities:
- 15 levels
- Beautiful graphics
- Pleasant music
